entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android x:Boolean Exception Only In Release Referencing Class Library as PackageReference #14790
  • AVCaptureSession.isMultitaskingCameraAccessEnabled Not exposed/accessible #14789
  • [iOS] CollectionView will not scroll to the end of a horizontal list when ItemSpacing > 0 #14788
    Backlog
  • [Android] Shadow not working properly with clipping #14786
  • Scrolling doesn't work when focus is placed on bottom controls in ScrollView. [iOS] #14779
    Backlog
  • SwipeView Open/Close Programmatically on Windows does not Work #14777
    Backlog
  • iOS Binding Does Nothing #14775
    Backlog

Closed

  • Crashing on Startup in Release on Physical Devices #14750
    Backlog
  • Label:[WinUI] FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application. #9104
    Backlog
  • Shadow does not work as expected on Android vs Windows #13688
    Backlog
  • [Windows 10] Feature for allowing to expand Shell.TitleView without clicking See more button #8597
  • [Bug] UI not updating after property removed and hot reloaded #2963
  • MAUI Resizetizer 'file is being used by another process' error when referencing a .NET MAUI App from another .NET MAUI App #14082
  • [Non-Shell] Toolbar items are affected from previous page on Android #14617
    Backlog
  • UILabel VerticalTextAlignment not working on iOS when there's a background #5575
    Backlog
  • The 'IsEnabled' and 'Color' properties of CheckBox component blocks MAUI application running on Mac #5694
    Backlog
  • When FlyoutItem is used instead of ShellContent, the menu item text is invisible #14688
  • Smart Binding Generator Needed #14781

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr6 ]Fix version for ems script manifest #14787
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Support reading fonts from files #14783
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • Don't measure text spans if type is HTML #14705
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Create better helpers for attaching and fix Window #14772
  • [core] use ToUpperInvariant() / ToLowerInvariant() #14773
    area/perf 🏎️, area/localization
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Set menuItem show action back to Never #14623
    backport/suggested
  • Bump Mono.Cecil from 0.11.4 to 0.11.5 #14768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14776
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Transition away from implicit package references #14770
    area/setup 🪄
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
